snippet: Students at Princeton and the University of California, Santa Barbara, have contracted a dangerous type of the bacterial infection, but officials say the episodes are probably unrelated.
abstract: Outbreaks of bacterial meningitis strike campuses at Princeton and University of California, Santa Barbara, though health officials say episodes are apparently unrelated.
lead_paragraph: Students at Princeton and the University of California, Santa Barbara, have contracted a dangerous type of the bacterial infection, but officials say the episodes are probably unrelated.

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
